text:
Jean-Michel Cadiot (23 December 1952 – 1 June 2020) was a French writer and journalist.
In the 2007 French legislative election, Cadiot ran for Deputy under the UDF-MoDem ticket in Val-d'Oise's 8th constituency. He only had 3.32% of the votes in the first round.
In 2008, he ran in the Canton of Sarcelles-Nord-Est, earning 3.48% of the vote.
Cadiot died on 1 June 2020 at the age of 67.
